Job Title: Operator III (3rd Shift)

Location: Tampa, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Bausch + Lomb (NYSE/TSX: BLCO) is a leading global eye health company dedicated to protecting and enhancing the gift of sight for millions of people around the worldâ€”from the moment of birth through every phase of life. Our mission is simple, yet powerful: helping you see better, to live better.

Our comprehensive portfolio of over 400 products is fully integrated and built to serve our customers across the full spectrum of their eye health needs throughout their lives. Our iconic brand is built on the deep trust and loyalty of our customers established over our 170-year history. We have a significant global research, development, manufacturing and commercial footprint of approximately 13,000 employees and a presence in approximately 100 countries, extending our reach to billions of potential customers across the globe. We have long been associated with many of the most significant advances in eye health, and we believe we are well positioned to continue leading the advancement of eye health in the future.

 Business Title: Operator III 

 Objectives/Purpose Of The Job: 

The job functions and responsibilities include basic proficient operation of aseptic filling equipment including line and equipment disinfection line clearances, component transfer, and proper documentation practices.

 Key Activities /Responsibilities/Job Functions: 

Operates automated aseptic filling line equipment (ointment and basic solution/suspension).Transfers components into the aseptic area.Maintains production area to prevent cross-contamination (line clearance).Disinfects aseptic filling lines after each run and performs line clearance.Operates Continuous Particle Monitoring System .Responsible for maintaining OEE (system entry and standards).Properly document all activities and operations correctly and on time in the batch record.Meets and maintains all required training during the year (SOP, EHS, and HR).Support operational excellence and EHS initiatives.Assume responsibility for the GMP, ISO, EHS awareness and compliance within the respective area.Attend and participate in OpEx improvement initiatives such as reducing costs and OEE improvements.All other duties, as assigned.

 Internal Qualifications/Certifications: 

Line Clearance .Aseptic Gowning .LOTO .Disinfection .CPMS .

 Qualifications/Training: 

High School diploma or equivalent.Able to work quickly and under pressure.Good documentation and math skills.Must be detail oriented and quality conscious.Good team oriented and excellent communication skills.Must be able to read, write, and speak English.

 Shift  : Monday to Friday 11:00pm to 7:30am

 Start Pay Range:  $ 17.50

 This position may be available in the following location: Tampa, FL. 

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status.

Job Applicants should be aware of job offer scams perpetrated through the use of the Internet and social media platforms.

To learn more please read Bausch+Lomb's Job Offer Fraud Statement .

Our Benefit Programs: https://www.bausch.com/careers/benefits/

Applicants must be authorized to work for ANY employer in the U.S. We are unable to sponsor or take over sponsorship of an employment Visa at this time.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
